name: tamely
content:
tamely adverb
(NOT WILD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not involve an animal being wild, dangerous, or frightened of humans: The dog tamely rested its head in her lap. A huge rat sat tamely under the table.
More examplesFewer examplesThe huge beast was now walking as tamely as a pet dog.
